channel.title: Getting dark bow 2 shoot like a bow
channel.description: hi i need help with making my dark bow shoot like a bow instead of just doing melee post please.

item.title: Getting dark bow 2 shoot like a bow
item.dc:creator: @bed240 bed240
item.description:
@bed240 wrote:

ur missing a || or im guesin u will get errors or wont work so

if(id == 4214 || id == 859 || id == 861 || id== 7622 || id == 4216){ // bows

sz jst had to mention

Read full topic
item.source: Getting dark bow 2 shoot like a bow

item.title: Getting dark bow 2 shoot like a bow
item.dc:creator: @Legendery Legendery
item.description:
@Legendery wrote:

ok heres the full thing.

Search for:

getwepanim

you should see this:

if(id == 4214 || id == 859 || id == 861 || id == 4216){ // bows

return ###;

change it to this:

if(id == 4214 || id == 859 || id == 861 id== 7622 || id == 4216){ // bows

Read full topic

hmm try searching for the crystal bow bit or 1 of the bows like

hope it helped and i hope you manage to get it working

item.title: Getting dark bow 2 shoot like a bow
item.dc:creator: @bed240 bed240
item.description:
@bed240 wrote:

its probably the easiest thing in the world i did it in like 1min just find this in ur client.java

if(id == 4214 || id == 859 || id == 861 ||){

and then on the end at the last “||”
add this

id == 7622

so now you should have something like this

if(id == 4214 || id == 859 || id == 861 || id == 7622){

now save and compile and ur done and it should work like a bow
but im not sure about double shot

Read full topic
